text:
@marcorubio Watch Marco Rubio play politics on the COVID-19 issue.

Ignore Trump's dismantling & understaffing the govt pandemic response institutions. Ignore Trump's inability to process the complexity of the issue. Do nothing to help.

Then accuse DEMOCRATS of playing politics.

#Hypocrisy

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
